addClass.description: add a class (or list of classes) to an element

removeClass.description: remove a class (or list of classes) from an element

hasClass.description: check if element has a specified class

toggleClass.description: add or remove class (or list of classes) from an element

cssSupports.description: add or remove class (or list of classes) from an element

focus.description: move focus to a different element

children.description: get children that have a specific class

index.description: index of a node element in an array
